p:
The Korean Government started a national hepatocellular carcinoma examination project in 2003.
412 The following factors need to be considered to improve the project: the target population; proper classification of hepatocellular carcinoma, as the International Classification of Diseases-10 code is inaccurate and does not provide appropriate guidelines on alcohol intake; and supportive hospital care programmes. Finally, lifestyle modifications for healthy bodyweight must be emphasised in the general population to prevent NAFLD.
